row.name: CREATE_PDF#

row.name: DASHNAME#
row.xui:
<combo alt="1" dynamic="0" enabled="1" fill="b" filter="0" focus="1" id="DASHNAMEs.00" nl="1" strict="1" text="Dashboard" tooltip="Choose the dashboard that you want to send via email. Must be shared by the user you are currently using." vtype="i"><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command owner="_self" owneraction="setsource" ownerparam="src|_dialog@src"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptcombolist" target="_self" targetaction="setlist" wait="0"/>

Must be shared by the user you are currently using.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </combo>
